DOC.brief_summary: To investigate impact traditional Chinese medicine ( TCM ) embryonic implantation patient underwent vitro fertilization embryo transfer , investigator compare pregnancy rate traditional Chinese medicine group control group . The hypothesis pregnancy rate traditional Chinese medicine group high control group .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Traditional Chinese Medicine ( TCM ) Embryo Implantation In-vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Patients
DOC.detailed_description: To demonstrate impact traditional Chinese medicine ( TCM ) embryo implantation , investigator perform prospective randomize study patient underwent vitro fertilization embryo transfer ( IVF-ET ) Reproductive Medical Center Remin Hospital Wuhan University next six month . These patient randomly divide two group , one group give traditional Chinese medicine , , ten day oral administration Zhuyun recipe day HCG injection . The second group without treatment , pregnancy rate observe . Frozen embryo transfer patient treatment , measure index also group . Our hypothesis Zhuyun recipe beneficial embryo implantation IVF-ET patient , find pregnancy rate traditional Chinese medicine group high control group .
DOC.criteria: 1. aged 1835 year old 2. undergo IVF/ICSIET treatment 3. undergo fresh/ frozen embryo transplantation 1. number embryos transplantation one 2. serum estradiol level > 5000 pg/ml progesterone level > 9 . 54 nmol/L day HCG administration
